65422.summary: Some customers in the Chilliwack Mountain area of Chilliwack are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
65422.title: Aug 12 - Chilliwack (Chilliwack Mountain) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
